body.p: The following table lists the spell-checker error messages by message ID.

row.entry: In the following text, change 'a' to 'an' where appropriate:

entry.p: In English, the general guideline is that the indefinite article in front of count nouns that begin with a vowel sound should be 'an'. The rule also applies to acronyms. For a good general discussion of the guidelines, see .

row.entry: In the following text, change 'an' to 'a' where appropriate:

entry.p: In English, the general guideline is that the indefinite article in front of count nouns that begin with a consonant sound should be 'a'. The rule also applies to acronyms. For a good general discussion of the guidelines, see .

row.entry: The word '{word}' is not allowed in the following text:

entry.p: The indicated word has been banned from use. Rewrite the phrase using alternatives.

row.entry: The punctuation mark '{char}' is duplicated in the following text:

entry.p: The indicated punctuation mark is duplicated. Delete the duplicated punctuation mark.

row.entry: The word '{word}' is duplicated in the following text:

entry.p: The indicated word is duplicated. Delete the duplicated word.

row.entry: The word '{word}' is capitalized incorrectly in the following text:

entry.p: The indicated word is not capitalized correctly. Fix the capitalization.

row.entry: The phrase '{phrase}' is grammatically incorrect in the following text:

entry.p: The indicated phrase does not make sense. Rewrite the phrase using the correct grammar.

row.entry: The punctuation mark '{char}' has been used incorrectly in the following text:

entry.p: The indicated punctuation mark is non-standard. Replace with a corrected punctuation mark.

row.entry: The word '{word}' is a spelling mistake in the following text:

entry.p: The indicated word is not spelled correctly. Fix the spelling.

row.entry: The accronym i.e or e.g has been used in the following text:

entry.p: Latin accronyms are difficult to understand. Consider rewriting the phrase using alternatives, such as "for example"

row.entry: The run on sentence the following text does not start with a capital letter

entry.p: The indicated sentence is not punctuated correctly. Fix the punctuation.

row.entry: The phrase '{words}' is written using a split-infinitive in the following text:

entry.p: The indicated sentence includes a split-infinitive, which is considered poor grammatical style - consider rephrasing the sentence.

row.entry: The word 'were' has been used to start a subordinate clause in the following text:

entry.p: The indicated sentence does not make sense. Rewrite the phrase using the correct grammar.
